definition: a machine that smooths or glazes paper or cloth by pressing it between plates or passing it through rollers, to press between rollers or plates so as to smooth, glaze, or thin into sheets
details:
noun
- a machine that smooths or glazes paper or cloth by pressing it between plates or passing it through rollers
verb
- to press between rollers or plates so as to smooth, glaze, or thin into sheets
= example: to press between rollers or plates so as to smooth, glaze, or thin into sheets
